comment: He was very helpful with the projects because it was easy to get stuck on certain things. Just follow the instructions given and pay attention when he is giving the lecture at the beginning.

Professor Baek's study materials are easy to understand and well-organized, and it's evident that a lot of preparation goes into the lessons. The materials provide clear direction and Professor Baek always responds promptly to students' questions.
He gives a stupid term project and slides for labs can be confusing but he is always open to help and is a very good professor
lots of work but a good professor

This class really teaches you about construction software. If you want to learn Auto Cad or BIM take this course it's very beneficial. Easy grader. Very easy assignments. The assignments are somewhat time consuming but not hard just a lot of steps. He gives you step by step instructions. He's so nice and a very generous grader. He is helpful too.
Great professor! I'll recommend him for sure

Great professor overall and respond to emails fairly quick. The class consists of USEFUL software in the real world for construction majors such as Revit, CAD, and much more. Easy A if you follow the PPT and video posted to help you with the assignment. Make sure you learn how to use it for the mid-term/final which they're easy.

I took both 3000 & 3040 (Building Information Modeling). Minsoo Baek is caring and wants his students to succeed.  Mid/Final was a similar assignment on 3000 but multiple choices on 3040. As long as you turn in the assignments on time by following PPT's directions and the video he provides, you will surely get an A.
Professor Baek was a great teacher for Computer App in Construction. He knew everything about all the software used in class and is always available to offer help in class. 10/10
HE is a pretty straightforward professor. He posts lectures on how to do the labs step by step so it is pretty easy. The midterm and final are easy, based on the labs. Take him to get an easy A.

Online class because of Covid. Easy A. He posts 45 min videos that you just have to follow along with. I've gotten 100 on every lab, midterm, and Final. The easiest class you'll take as long as you turn in the labs on time. However, he does accept late work for 50 points off.

I took this class online and the curriculum was very straight forward. He gives a lab every week depending on how long it will take. I received a 100 on every lab except one just by following the videos. It will be hard to not pass this class because he doesn't assign much but the labs, a midterm, and a final. I recommend this professor.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria
